page.title: 15GLENLIVET HOUSING AND HEALTH
page.content: Most of the {houses}in Glenlivet are centred round the distillery which is the main employer in the area. There are 20 houses there, most of which have been built in the last 15 years. In the village of Bridgend there are only 5 fairly old stone houses. The other houses in the area are farm houses, private detached houses and old crofts which have been renovated and are now holiday cottages. There is a {doctor }and a{ district {nurse}who attend to the health of the people. The doctor consults every weekday and does a lot more house calls than is usual in town. He also does his own dispensing. The nurse visits the elderly and bed-ridden as well as the under fives. There is a geriatric hospital at Aberlour but the General and Maternity hospitals are at Elgin.
